Text: True, however, If a person consumes only GMO's, it will not be long before they die anyway. They are extremely toxic. GMO roundup seeds are chemically modified with herbicides produced by the U.S. company Monsanto, and contains the active ingredient glyphosate. Just think, Ingestion of >85 mL of the concentrated formulation of glyphosate is likely to cause significant toxicity in adults and that is in the food. Is it really safe to feed people food made with ingredients to kill stuff? The simple and honest answer is no.
